Content: I cleaned the carbs on my 82 cb900c and I am only getting a squirt from the pump on number 1 and 2 carbs, nothing on 3 or 4. I did use an ultrasonic cleaner and the tubes are clean so I am looking for any suggestions on what the problem could be. Thanks, John
